name: Inkman Pete
description:
The Berlin studios used to be the prime in all’s day. Several years later, a former employee there named Pete rediscovered the rotting residence and unlocks the secret of the inky abyss lurking inside of it. Now it is up to Pete to seal away the ink from contaminating the world, just as it did to the studio 10 years ago.

Your device is incomplete. Go to purplecade+ now and play at no additional cost
